Barbecue Restaurant - Home Team BBQ Menu/Locations Order Online open daily Menu/Locations Merch Our Story Events News Catering Catering follow Order Online Here Aspen, CO Columbia Downtown Charleston Greenville, SC Mt. Pleasant Sullivan’s Island West Ashley LARGE PICK-UP & DELIVERY Full-Service Catering Seasonal Menus Start a quote A barbecue restaurant combining traditional processes and techniques of classical cuisine with the simplicity of comfort food, bbq, and southern fare. At Home Team BBQ we have taken a unique approach by bringing the fundamentals of the “white tablecloth” world to the low and slow ideals of BBQ. In our barbecue restaurants, we believe in keeping it fresh and local, and sending guests happily on their way after a good time has
been had by all. With a menu of award-winning food, ever-evolving bar offerings, a fun and family friendly atmosphere, catering options, and live entertainment, it makes it easy to root for Home Team BBQ! JOIN THE HOME TEAM! Join a tight-knit crew of dedicated teammates who work together at your neighborhood go-to spot for College Football to serve up great BBQ, good vibes, and top-tier guest experiences. We are seeking driven candidates who are organized, professional, and have a love for the food and beverage industry. 

Home Team BBQ offers competitive salaries, a benefits program including employer-paid health insurance, paid time off, a 401k plan with employer match, quarterly profit sharing and opportunities for personal/professional growth. Interested candidates should submit resumes to employment@hometeambbq.com AND apply online at hometeambbq.com. View our job openings! EVENTS MUSIC FOOD good times SMELL WHAT’S COOKING join our loyalty program! Register your Pig Points sign in here to earn PIG POINTS and take advantage of our latest deals! Have our team cater to yours BOOK THE 'QUE! We’re nothing without our community! Please reach out if you are interested in having Home Team BBQ support a community event or fundraiser. Gibbet Hill Grill - Gibbet Hill Grill Skip to content Gibbet Hill Grill Primary Menu Home About Menus Private Events Trails Contact News Careers Instagram Facebook Careers Instagram Facebook Gibbet Hill Grill 61 Lowell Road Groton, MA 01450 978-448-2900 Make a Reservation Buy a Gift Card Purchase a Gibbet Hill Grill Gift Card Gibbet Hill Grill Gift Card $ 25.00 – $ 250.00 Denomination Choose an option $25 $50 $75 $100 $125 $150 $200 $250 Clear Gibbet Hill Grill Gift Card quantity Add to cart SKU: GiftCard-GHG Category: Uncategorized Description Additional information Description All physical Gibbet Hill Grill Gift Cards are sent via USPS Priority Mail, shipping calculated at checkout. – OR – IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO PURCHASE AN INSTANTLY DOWNLOADABLE GIFT CARD, PLEASE CLICK HERE . Gift cards are redeemable at Gibbet Hill Grill, as well as Scarlet Oak Tavern, The Bancroft, and The Double Bull Taphouse. Additional information Weight 1 oz Dimensions 3.375 × 2.125 × 0.1 in Denomination $25, $50, $75, $100, $125, $150, $200, $250, Custom To purchase larger/different denominations, add multiple cards to the basket and indicate your preference in the comments. × A Farm to Table Restaurant Gibbet Hill Grill is at the forefront of the local food movement. We are one of the only restaurants in New England that has a multi-acre livestock and produce farm on site, and our chef shapes the menu around what is seasonally available. Located on the 100-acre Gibbet Hill Farm in Groton, MA, guests can experience farm-to-table dining while enjoying the beautiful landscape of Gibbet Hill. Menus Produce from our own farm DINNER LUNCH Cocktails WINE BEER Dessert KIDS Learn about our Beverage and Cocktail Program DINNER Dinner menu is served Monday - Friday, 4pm - close, and Saturday & Sunday, 11:30am - close. All items available for takeout. Please click HERE if you would like to place your order online. The dining room is closed from 3pm-4pm, Monday - Friday. Beverage and Cocktail Program Cocktails Gibbet Hill Grill's Cocktail Menu evolves seasonally, and during harvest season, you will see much of our cocktail menu ingredients come directly from our farm. Local distillers, creative recipes, house made syrups, and tinctures shape our specialty cocktail list. Wines At Gibbet Hill Grill we believe that wine should be considered a regular part of every meal, and that a wine list should not be pretentious or inaccessible to anyone. Subsequently our wines are all carefully chosen to provide both quality and an excellent pairing for Chef’s food. The wine list maintains its own set of core values, and all the wines fall into at least three of these categories to even be considered. Incredible quality Small production or family owned Innovative find Structured perfectly for food Surprising value Special connection to our team Every wine on our list has been tasted, and as we continue to rotate the wines with the season and vintage changes, any and all wines will be reviewed before being presented to our guests. In the meantime, we will continue to strive to find new wines that can’t be found in local restaurants in order to provide our guests with an interesting, innovative, food-based wine list that is worth coming back to explore. In 2016, we added our own label to the wine list, Patriarch, a red blend that was blended by our own wine director, Kate Webber. The goal was to create a red blend that appealed to a wide audience and but would also pair with a large number of menu items across our restaurants. The varietals change with every new vintage. Beer In 2022 we partnered with one of our favorite local breweries, Channel Marker, to create a New England style IPA brewed exclusively for Webber Restaurant Group restaurants. After months of recipe testing, tasting, and refining with a team of WRG beer lovers, Captain Max was born. Captain Max is a New England style, hazy IPA that features Citra, Mosaic, and Cashmere hops. These hops drive forward flavors and aromas of freshly peeled oranges, clementines, and a subtle hint of passionfruit. Private Events We are pleased to offer private events at Gibbet Hill and at The Barn at Gibbet Hill.  If you are interested in learning more about a private event , please click on the "Plan Your Event" button below and fill out the form. Gibbet Hill Grill can host events up to 35 guests on our mezzanine level during regular business hours (excluding Saturday evenings). For weddings and larger events, please contact The Barn at Gibbet Hill . Plan Your Event The Mezzanine Parties of up to 35 seated guests for a plated dinner are welcome in this spacious and versatile space.  Guests enjoy use of the upstairs silo, and fireside mezzanine which overlooks the bar and lounge. The Silo A coveted setting for special occasions of up to 8 guests each, our two silo rooms offer stunning views of Gibbet Hill and unique dining experiences. Meet the Team Martha Lisio, General Manager Martha’s formal education includes studying accounting at Babson College, but after one too many audits, she realized she needed to be around more people and less paper. Moving to Marco Island, Florida, she began her career in the restaurant industry and also spent some time as a mate on a parasail boat.  Having successfully shunned the stress of corporate life for six years, she returned to Massachusetts and rediscovered her high school sweetheart. Celebrating their fourth wedding anniversary at Gibbet Hill Grill, table 28 to be exact, she told her husband, “I love the energy in this room, I could work here.”  The rest is history.  Martha joined the team in 2005 and was promoted to general manager in 2015. Joe Salisbury, Farm Manager Armed with a degree in Plant, Soil & Insect Sciences from UMass Amherst, Gibbet Hill Farm Manager, Joe Salisbury, has been farming in New England for the last decade.  From blueberry farming in the Berkshires, to greenhouse management in Deerfield to kitchen gardener at the historic Island Inn, off the coast of central Maine on Monhegan Island, Joe’s passion for sustainable farming has continued to grow.  Working with the chefs at Island Inn, allowed him to reconnect small scale farming to the culinary world which ultimately led him to Gibbet Hill. When he’s not at work on the farm, you might find him learning a new language or in the kitchen incorporating freshly harvested produce he’s grown into pickled items or into a savory meal such as butternut squash mac & cheese or tarragon chicken. Torched Bar & Grill | Cape Coral’s Live Music Tiki Bar Home About Us Events Contact Us Tiki Bar & Grill in Cape Coral, Florida Island Vibes The Menu Plan a Party Escape the Ordinary Call Us (239) 257-2870 Visit Us 2408 Surfside Blvd Ste 101, Cape Coral, FL 33991 Get Directions Locally BUILT. Community Inspired. Where Cape Coral comes to eat, drink, and feel like family. Torched Bar & Grill is a true local hangout in Cape Coral, Florida. We’re a tiki-style bar and grill built for the people who keep our community moving. Veterans, first responders, and hospitality pros are part of the Torched family, and we show it every day with respect, service, and perks that go beyond the plate. We serve flame-grilled favorites, ice-cold cocktails, and laid-back island vibes from morning to last call. Whether you're off shift, visiting for the weekend, or a Cape Coral native, Torched is where good food and good people always come together. Ask your server about our “ITB” program for hospitality workers and enjoy exclusive all-day discounts. 125,000+ Locals Served 12 Live Shows a Month 32 Beers Selection 10 Years Supporting Veterans The Heart of Cape Coral More Than Dinner Dinner. Drinks. Music. At Torched, we don’t just serve meals... we deliver moments. From sizzling plates that light up the room to cocktails that kick harder than a Friday night band, every visit is an experience worth talking about.
